1239:4: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti|
1239:5: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayituṃ|
1239:8: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
1239:15: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati;
1239:19: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasidvasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa vā'sidvasambhāvanāpi||
1239:29: sambhave vā tenaiva pakṣe'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasidveralaṃ sattānumāneneti cet|
1239:32: tathā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇe tāvat ekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti|
1239:33: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi kiṃ tāme vārthakriyāṃ kuryādanyāṃ vā,
1239:37: yadā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryyaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kāryye śakto'śakto vā|
1239:38: yadi śaktastadā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt tatrāpi śaktatvāt śaktasya kṣepāyogāt|
1239:41: athāśaktastadā ekatra kāryye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvvāraprasaraḥ syāt|
1239:43: yadā hi śaktasya svabhāvasya vilambo'pyasahyastadā dūrītsāritamakaraṇam|
1239:48: tadevamekatra kāryye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedāt ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam|
1239:53: asya ca dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇavyavahāragocaratvasya prasaṅgasādhanasya vārttamānikakāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ sidvatvāt asidvistāvadasambhavinī|
1239:57: sākṣādajanake'pi kuśūlādyavasthita-vījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet|
1239:60: tatra yatpāramārthikam jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttaṃ|
1239:61: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthita vījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvāt aupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte sambhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā|
1239:68: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvvasya sarvvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt|
1239:70: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivarttamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisidveranavadyo hetuḥ|
1239:71: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryyakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe ca atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyaṃ janayati|
1239:76: tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyaṃ yathā śālyaṅkuramakurvvan kodravaḥ śālyaṅkure|
1239:77: na karoti caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyamiti vyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam|
1239:80: na cānaikāntikatā pūrvvoktena nyāyena samartha vyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayovidhibhūtayoḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt|
1239:81: yatpunaratroktaṃ yadyadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ|
1239:88: na cātrapakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryyāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitaṃ|
1239:90: kāraṇatvasamarthavyavahāragocaratvayośca bṛkṣaśiṃśapayoriva vyāvṛttibhedo'stītyanavasara eva evaṃvidhasya kṣudrapralāpasya|
1239:91: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ|
1239:95: dṛṣṭāntamātra eva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayābhyāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt nanvābhyāmeva pakṣe'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirastviti cet|
1239:97: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyā dikamupanyasituṃ analasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ|
1239:98: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa ttvekatradharmmiṇi yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyādinyāyena sattvamātramasthairyyavyāptamavadhāryyasattvādevānyatra kṣaṇikatvamavagacchatīti|
1239:99: kathamapramattovaiyarthyamasyācakṣīta tadevamekārthakāriṇo ghaṭasya dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyāpekṣayā samarthetarasvabhāvavirudvadharmmā dhyāsāt bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgatayā sapakṣatāmāvahati ghaṭe sattveheturupalabhyamāno na virudvaḥ|
1239:101: atraiva sādharmmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt|
1239:102: nanu viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalābdyāptisiddhistasya copanyāsavārttāpi nāsti tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ prasādhiteti cet|
1239:104: tathā hi uktametat varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryye'pi ghaṭasya śaktisambhave tadānīmevaitat karaṇamakaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ|
1239:105: nanvevaṃ anvayamātramastu vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyamiti cet,
1239:108: na dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiranvayarūpā ca karttṛdharmmaḥ|
1239:110: vyatirekarūpā ca karmmadharmmaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanasyāvaśyamabhāvo yaḥ|
1239:114: yathā viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe anvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvvaṃ sthito'pi paścātparigalati|
1239:116: tathā prasaṅgatadviparyyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvvaṃ sthito'pi sandehaḥ paścātparigalatyeva|
1239:119: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ tadevaṃ viparyyayabādhakapramāṇamantareṇāpi prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalāt anvayarūpavyāptisidvau sattvahetoranaikāntikasyābhāvādataḥ sādhanāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviranavadyeti|
1239:126: na ca pūrvvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātā'sti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt|
1239:128: na ca pūrbbotarakālayoḥ sambittī tābhyāṃ vāsanā tayā ca hetuphalāvasāyī vikalpa iti yuktaṃ|
1239:129: sa hi vikalpo gṛhītānusandhāyako'tadrūpasamāropako vā na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ|
1239:136: tathā hi vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ vījādijñānāt kāryyādaṅkurādervā niścetavyaṃ|
1239:150: tataśca sāmarthyasandehe bhavatītyeva vaktumaśakyaṃ kathamabhūtvābhāvitvaṃ kāryyatvaṃ setsyati|
1239:151: apekṣitaparavyāpāratvaṃ kāryyatvamityapi nāsato dharmmaḥ sattvañca sāmarthyaṃ tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryyasiddhiḥ|
1239:152: tadasidvau pūrvvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsidvo hetuḥ|
1239:154: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvat ajātasyānanvayanirudvasya vā kāryyārambhakatvaṃ sambhavati|
1239:155: na ca nispannasya tāvān kṣaṇo'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryyāya vyāpāryyet|
1239:160: yadvā, sarvvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye virudvatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti|
1239:167: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tat pratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam|
1239:169: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravartteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyate|
1239:172: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā virudvaṃ vaktumucitaṃ,
1239:175: tathāhi kāraṇajñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva iti anvayaniścayo janyate,
1239:176: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbhaṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate|
1239:190: kintu yatra pramāṇapratīte vījādau vastubhūte dharmmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthya tatra kṣaṇābhaṅga sādhanāya|
1239:192: anyathā na kvacidapi vastumātrasyāpi pratipattiḥ syāt|
1239:193: tasmācchāstrīyasattvalakṣaṇasandehe'pi paṭupratyakṣavalāvalambitavastubhāve aṅkurādau kāryyatvamupalabhyamānaṃ vījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsidvidoṣāvakāśaḥ|
1239:200: adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanāt vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasidviriti kva virodhaḥ|
1239:201: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve api anyanivṛttī na vastunī svalakṣaṇāvagāhitve abhilāpasaṃsargānupapatteriti cet|
1239:213: yathā sarvvasyāsattve'pi vījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ dṛṣṭasya niyatahetuphalabhāvasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt|
1239:214: paraṃ vāhyenārthena sati pratibandhe prāmāṇyamanyathātvaprāmāṇyamiti viśeṣaḥ|
1239:216: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto'sambhavepyatadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt|
1239:217: dvividho hi pratyakṣasya viṣayo grāhyo'dhyavaseyaśca sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt|
1239:231: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ|
1239:233: yadvā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭātmako deśakālāntarabartī atadrūpaparāvṛttaḥ sarvvo viśeṣaḥ|
1239:243: anyathā ghaṭo'pi ghaṭasantāno'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyet sarvvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt|
1239:245: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu|
1239:246: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatve sādhanasya virudvatvaṃ syāt iti na kaścidvirodhaprabhedaprasaṅgaḥ|
1239:249: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayavalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyettadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisidveranaikāntikatvaṃ na syāditi yuktam|
1239:251: tathāhi śakto'pi ghaṭaḥ kramisahakāryyapekṣayā kramikāryyaṃ kariṣyati|
1239:252: na caitad vaktavyaṃ samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti|
1239:253: svarūpañca sarvvadāstītyanupakāriṇi sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti,
1239:256: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ|
1239:258: tasmādarthaḥ samartho'pi syāt na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ|
1239:261: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurbbāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryyaḥ|
1239:262: na ca so'pyakṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvādbhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ|
1239:267: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryyasambhavaḥ|
1239:268: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ karttā syāt yuktametat|
1239:269: kintu sāmagrī janikā tataḥ sahakāryyantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso'pi na kāryyaprasava iti kimatra virudvaṃ|
1239:270: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇakarotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti|
1239:275: atrocyate| yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamepāmastu ko niṣedvā?
1239:276: militaireva tu tatkāryya karttavyamiti kuto labhyate?
1239:279: tasmāt sāmagrī janika naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ|
1239:281: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭādbhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam|
1239:282: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatti rna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryyotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti|
1239:283: na ca pratyabhijñādibalādekatvasidviḥ tat pauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādāvapyupalambhato nirddalanāt,
1239:287: vyāptau tu sākṣātparamparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake'yogavyavacchedaḥ|
1239:290: tatsvabhāve ca vyāpye'nyayogavyavacchedo vikalpāruḍharūpāpekṣayā vyāptau dvividhamavadhāraṃam|
1239:291: nanu yadi pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvvadājanakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāttadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate|
1239:292: na kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet|
1239:295: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvvakālabhāvī|
1239:296: pūrvvakālabhāvī vā yo'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī,
1239:298: tathā ca sati sidvayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope sidvameva jananamajananambā'sajyata iti|
1239:301: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthya nijamāgantukañca sahakāryyantaraṃ tato'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryyanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet|
1239:304: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ arthakriyādharmmakamavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamugdīritaṃ|
1239:306: yattu kāryyeṇaiva sahakāriṇo'pekṣanta ityupatkṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogaṃ|
1239:307: yadi hi kāryyameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syādyuktametat|
1239:310: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvvathā'samarthāḥ|
1239:312: atha kāryyasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet|
1239:320: yadi hi svayambhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryyaṃ tadā tadabhāvaprayukto'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt|
1239:321: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kāryyasvātantryānna bhavati|
1239:322: tathā tadabhāve'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryyeta|
1239:326: tasmād yathaiva tadbhāve niyamena na bhavati|
1239:332: yo hṛttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt|
1239:333: na tarhi tatkāryyakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti|
1239:334: atrocyate| sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasya uttarakālamevedaṃ kāryyaṃ na pūrvvakālamiti kuta etat|
1239:336: kiṃ kurmmaḥ uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet;
1239:338: sthiṣtvepyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet|
1239:340: dhūmādagnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt|
1239:348: uttarakāryyajananavyavahāragocaratvañca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryyakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmmiṇi sidvaṃ|
1239:349: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasya kāryyasya prathame kṣaṇe'sambhavādeva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate|
1239:350: na hi nīlakārake'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasambhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodhonāma|
1239:355: tathāhi bījamaṅkurādikaṃ kurvvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikantadākṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ|
1239:356: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhāvau parasparavirudvau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta|
1239:362: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ garddabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api virudvau dharmau|
1239:364: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirvirudvadharmmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti|
1239:367: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ|
1239:368: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatradharmmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt|
1239:369: tadatraikaḥ svbhāvaḥ svābhāvena virudvo yukto bhāvābhāvavat|
1239:375: tadyadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāri ṇāvapi svabhāvāvavirudvo tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vā viṣayabhedādavirudve,
1239:379: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryyaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādavirudve śaktayaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryye kālabhedādapyavirudve|
1239:380: yathāpūrvvaṃ nniḥkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet|
1239:381: ucyate| na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kāryye deśabhedādavirudve śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ|
1239:391: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavadvā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ|
1239:392: tadatraikadharmmiṇi tat kālakāryyakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryyākāritvasyānyakāryyakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ|
1239:393: tathā hi yatraiva dharmmiṇi tatkālakāryyakāritvamupalabdhanna tatraiva kālāntare tat kāryyākāritvamanyakāryyakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃharttuṃ śakyate,
1239:398: ata eva vajro'pi pakṣakūkṣau nikṣiptaḥ kathamasau sphaṭiko varākaḥ kālabhedenābhedāsādhanāya dṛṣṭāntībhavitumarhati|
1239:399: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryyāṇāṃ deśabhede'pi dharmmibhedo yukto bhedasādhakapramāṇābhāvādindriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācca|
1239:400: iti na kālabhede'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ|
1239:407: tathāhyupasapaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro vījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvvasmādeva puñjāt samarthojāto'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate|
1239:408: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu vijasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva vījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati bījakṣaṇānnānye vījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥpātinaḥ|
1239:409: nahyupasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavarttināṃ vījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ|
1239:410: athopasarpaṇāt prāṅna tat santāna varttino'pi janayanti paramparayāpyaṅkurotpādānuguṇaṃ vījakṣaṇaṃ vījamātrajananātteṣāṃ|
1239:412: hanta tarhi yadabhāve satyutpannopi na janayedeva|
1239:413: tathā kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasambhavādādyātiśayotpādamaṅkuraṃ vā prati kṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmakenāpi svīkarttavyaṃ|
1239:417: api cāntyo vījakṣaṇo'napekṣo'ṅkurādikaṃ kurvvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ|
1239:420: tathā hi vījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ kṣityādikaṃ tu prati sahakāritvaṃ|
1239:425: abhede vā kathaṃ vījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt|
1239:428: kśityādau janayitavye tadupādānam purvvameva kṣityādivījasya rūpāntaramiti|
1239:432: na ca kṣaṇasyopakārasambhavo'nyatra jananāt tasyābhedyatvādityanekatvamapi nāstīti dvitīyo'pi vyāpakābhāvo na sidvaḥ|
1239:434: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryyeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvāt sahakaraṇācca|
1239:436: kariṣyate ca kramavat sahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryyāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasidveḥ|
1239:441: atha pūrvvāvasthitasyaiva vījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha sambhūyakaraṇaṃ|
1239:448: atha tadvā tādṛgvā āsīditi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ|
1239:449: tatastādṛksvabhāvasambhavepyakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet|
1239:452: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavarttiṣu vījakṣaṇeṣu sarvveṣveva sambhavī kintu keṣucideva karmmakarakara pallavasahacareṣu|
1239:453: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilabanādipūrvvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvvāṇyeva vījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante,
1239:455: ucyate| kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvvatra kāryye dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca sarvvāstikaprasidvametat|
1239:457: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva vījakṣaṇānāṃ yena taeva vījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkurambā paramparayā janayeyu rnānye vījakṣaṇāḥ|
1239:464: pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhedabhinnānyakālakṣaṇādbhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstyasau jitvaraḥ|
1239:466: sāmagrī tu na sarvvathekṣaṇasahā kāryyantu mānānugamamiti||
1239:467: tadevaṃ nopakāro'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣyaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛttiḥ|
1239:469: tadā yadi pūrvvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā|
1239:474: yacca vījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede'pi kāryyabhede'pi kāryyasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ tadasaṅgataṃ|
1239:478: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryyābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretaṃ sāmagrīsajātīyatve na kāryyavijātīyatetyarthaḥ|
1239:479: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryyaṃ na karttavyaṃ nāma|
1239:482: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdhaṃ yena tatrāpi bhedaśaṅkā syāt|
1239:487: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasidvau na kṣaṇikāt sattvannivarttata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ|
1239:488: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ|
1239:491: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyyayayoḥ sattve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvamataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviriti sthitam||
